throw a spear that bouncing on the edges
a stone sling shot

fires cannon balls to nearest enemies
calls down bombards on random location

shoots out a penetrating shot, only attack when staying still
shoot a bolt towards enemies, cooldown reduced when staying still
fires a lot of projectiles to random direction
fires arrows towards enemies, cooldown reduced when staying still
summons a mace that attack nearest enemy, and stuns them for short period
spinning around the user and on the end of its effect, make a single strike
periodically absorb damage taken, and shorten the distance between characters

hurl a slashing effect on stop

각궁의 진화무기. 공격이 닿으면 그자리에 석회가루 비슷한 공격 장판 생성

석궁의 진화무기. 공격이 닿으면 그자리에 석회가루 비슷한 공격 장판 생성
